title: Feeding Your Dog: A Guide to Proper Nutrition
story: Jason. It's time to feed the dog. Already, mom? Okay. We have to feed him twice a day. What should I give him? One can and one scoop of dry food. Is that all? Yes. That's plenty. He really likes it, mom.
summary: Learn the basics of feeding your dog, including how much and what to feed them, to ensure they receive the proper nutrition.
image: An image of a bowl filled with dog food and a happy dog eating from it.
